plot: In Lapland, a boy is killed skiing, his brother is killed by a pet reindeer, and father is killed, too.
title: Frozen Fate
plot_es: In Lapland, a boy is killed skiing, his brother is killed by a pet reindeer, and father is killed, too.
plot_en: In Lapland, a boy is killed skiing, his brother is killed by a pet reindeer, and father is killed, too.
